channel.description: Recent content in A10 on Game6r

item.title: Tomb Runner game
item.description: After starting this game, you will find yourself in mysterious places full of dangers. You will steal a huge crystal, after which you need to run forward and only forward, trying to go as long as possible. Jump over obstacles or crawl under them, don’t forget to collect as many coins as possible.
